name: CandyApple
description:
CandyApple is a captivating 2.5D anime-style model that specializes in creating adorable characters.

This model can handle various genres such as fantasy, sci-fi, and more.

I kindly request that you generate images with gentleness and kindness. 🌸

Let's focus on spreading positivity and delight through the generation of cute characters. 🌟

**Please note that you are solely responsible for any images created using this model.

VAE: Baked

Change log:

Version 1.2:
Fixed character age, Optimized various elements

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
If you find value in this model and want to help take it to new heights, you can support towards upgrading my GPU on Ko-fi or Buy Me a Coffee

If there's anything you need, please don't hesitate to let me know.

- - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - - -
Here are my other models:

CalicoMix a general-purpose model.

CalicoMixReal a realistic version of CalicoMix.

CalicoMix DC a simplified variant with a cuter appeal.

CottonCandy Pastel a colorful pastel model.

FluffyMarshmallow focus on cute/kawaii characters.
